select count(*) as count, date_format(aDate, "%Y-%m-%d") as date from reterns where
aDate >= date_sub(now(), interval 1 week)
aDate >= date_sub(now(), interval 1 month)
aDate >= date_sub(now(), interval 2 month)
aDate >= date_sub(now(), interval 3 month)
aDate > now()
group by date
mapper.insert: insert into reterns(isbn, email, cDate, bStatus, duration, rDate, aDate, id) values (#{ isbn }, #{ email }, #{ cDate }, #{ bStatus }, #{ duration }, #{ rDate }, #{ aDate }, #{ id })
mapper.delete: delete from reterns where email = #{ email } and isbn = #{ isbn }
mapper.select: select r.*, b.name, p.username, p.phone from reterns r, book b, person p where r.email = p.email and r.isbn = b.isbn order by cDate desc
